org.dyn4j.collision

Interface Bounds

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Transformable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBounds, AxisAlignedBounds, RectangularBounds

    public interface Bounds
extends Transformable
    Represents the Bounds of the simulation/world.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.0
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transform getTransform()
      Returns the Bounds Transform.
      boolean isOutside(Collidable collidable)
      Returns true if the given Collidable is outside the bounds.
      void shiftCoordinates(Vector2 shift)
      Translates the bounds to match the given coordinate shift.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dyn4j.geometry.Transformable

        rotate, rotate, rotate, translate, translate

    • Method Detail

      • getTransform

        Transform getTransform()
        Returns the Bounds Transform.
        Returns:
        Transform

      • shiftCoordinates

        void shiftCoordinates(Vector2 shift)
        Translates the bounds to match the given coordinate shift.
        Parameters:
        shift - the amount to shift along the x and y axes
        Since:
        3.1.0

      • isOutside

        boolean isOutside(Collidable collidable)
        Returns true if the given Collidable is outside the bounds.

        If the Collidable contains zero BodyFixtures then Collidable is considered to be outside the bounds.

        Parameters:
        collidable - the Collidable to test
        Returns:
        boolean true if outside the bounds
